x10.matrix.comm

Class MatrixReduce

  • x10.matrix.comm.MatrixRemoteCopy
    • x10.matrix.comm.MatrixReduce

  • public class MatrixReduce
extends MatrixRemoteCopy
    The class provides reduce-sum communication for distributed matrix,

    This operation adds matrix blocks from all places and stores result in dense format at here, using provided temporary dense matrix blocks space to receive data.

    Two implementations are available. One uses MPI routines, and the other is based on X10 remote array copy. To enable MPI communication, add "-define MPI_COMMU -cxx-prearg -DMPI_COMMU" in x10c++ build command, when you include commu package in your application source code, or link to the proper GML library (native_mpi version).

    For more information on how to build different backends and runtime, run command "make help" at the root directory of GML library.

      • reduceSum

        public static x10.lang.Int reduceSum(x10.regionarray.DistArray<DenseMatrix> ddmat,
                     x10.regionarray.DistArray<DenseMatrix> ddtmp)
        Declaration: reduceSum(ddmat:x10.regionarray.DistArray[x10.matrix.DenseMatrix]{self.dist.region.rank==1},ddtmp:x10.regionarray.DistArray[x10.matrix.DenseMatrix]{self.dist.region.rank==1}): x10.lang.Int.
        Reduce all dense matrices stored in DistArray from all places
to here
        

        Parameters:
        ddmat - Input/Output. Duplicated dense matrix of source and target matrix
        ddtmp - Temp matrix space to store the receiving data.
        

        Returns:
        Number of elements to received

        reduceSum
        

        public static x10.lang.Int reduceSum(x10.regionarray.DistArray<DenseMatrix> ddmat,
                     DenseMatrix tmp,
                     x10.lang.Int colcnt,
                     x10.regionarray.Array<x10.lang.Int> plist)
        

        Declaration: reduceSum(ddmat:x10.regionarray.DistArray[x10.matrix.DenseMatrix]{self.dist.region.rank==1},tmp:x10.matrix.DenseMatrix,colcnt:x10.lang.Int,plist:x10.regionarray.Array[x10.lang.Int]{self.rank==1}): x10.lang.Int.
        Perform reduce sum of all matrces stored in the duplicated matrix
from specified list of places. This method is not optimized.
Result is stored in the matrix at root place.
        

        Parameters:
        ddmat - input and output matrix.
        tmp - temp matrix storing the inter-place communication data at root.
        colcnt - column count
        plist - list of place ids

        The class provides reduce-sum communication for distributed matrix,


         This operation adds matrix blocks from all places and stores result
in dense format at here, using provided temporary dense matrix blocks
space to receive data.


         Two implementations are available. One uses MPI routines, and the other
is based on X10 remote array copy.
To enable MPI communication, add "-define MPI_COMMU -cxx-prearg -DMPI_COMMU"
in x10c++ build command, when you include commu package in your application source
code, or link to the proper GML library (native_mpi version).


        For more information on how to build different backends and runtime,
run command "make help" at the root directory of GML library.
